list.name: Changes
list.comment: feat(css): implement responsive background shapes with multiple backgrounds + image-set() - Replaced messy tags with a single .bg-shapes layer - Used multiple backgrounds in CSS to position all decorative shapes - Applied media queries for layout-specific swaps (mobile / tablet / desktop) - Integrated image-set() for high-DPI screens to ensure crisp visuals - Result: cleaner HTML, more responsive backgrounds, and sharper assets on Retina devices Signed-off-by: mohammed el aouri
